page.title: 15Police station,Abercynon
page.content: The old police station was opened in 1906 and had creepy cells,two large courts and was very large.It closed in1984 and the new police station with only three rooms,opened.There are six police officers,one sergeant,a clerk and a traffic warden who comes in twice a week.The area has a lower{ {crime rate}than other areas.When there is a crime where they need police dogs or other{special services,}they are always availible.{Police training}in Mid.Glam.takes place in Cwmbran and Bridgend.People would rather the police patrole on foot but the people also want a fast reaction if there is a crime.Thereis no other police station in our block but people in Cilfynydd would like a station in their area.
